name: Beginner
content: Regardless of the day, it means you have never danced the dance before, and need to start with the basics. You would learn enough in this course to be ready to dance with everyone at the evening dances. You may/may not have prior dance experience, either way you will be taught as if you are new to the dance.

name: Intermediate
content: You can do a swingout, and are pretty comfortable with yourself, but as speeds start to get faster you may not know what to do. In general you still need to work on your technique and creativity.

name: Intermediate Advanced
content: Your come around and toss out are anywhere from passable to stellar. This track is mixed so there will be both advanced and intermediate dancers.

name: Advanced
content: You have a solid swingout, compete often, and are here for really refining your already solid technique. You have no issues dancing higher BPM songs, and can hold your own when things may not go as planned.
